scripts.build: npm --prefix client i && npm --prefix client i babel-core@^7.0.0-bridge.0 && npm --prefix client run prod
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test-frontend && bundle exec rspec
